VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v1_penerimaan_rek_biaya` AS select `a`.`Id` AS `Id`,`a`.`c1` AS `c1`,`a`.`c` AS `c`,`a`.`d` AS `d`,`a`.`e` AS `e`,`a`.`e1` AS `e1`,`a`.`jns` AS `jns`,`a`.`jns2` AS `jns2`,`a`.`jns_trans` AS `jns_trans`,`a`.`k` AS `k`,`a`.`l` AS `l`,`a`.`m` AS `m`,`a`.`n` AS `n`,`a`.`o` AS `o`,`a`.`jumlah` AS `jumlah`,`a`.`refid` AS `refid`,`a`.`refid_rek` AS `refid_rek`,`a`.`tgl_buku` AS `tgl_buku`,`a`.`uid` AS `uid`,`a`.`sttemp` AS `sttemp`,`a`.`tgl_create` AS `tgl_create`,`a`.`tgl_update` AS `tgl_update`,`a`.`tahun` AS `tahun`,`b`.`asal_usul` AS `asal_usul`,`b`.`sumber_dana` AS `sumber_dana`,`rr`.`nm_rekening` AS `nm_rekening` from ((`t_penerimaan_rek_biaya` `a` left join `t_penerimaan_barang` `b` on((`a`.`refid` = `b`.`Id`))) left join `ref_rekening` `rr` on(((`a`.`k` = `rr`.`k`) and (`a`.`l` = `rr`.`l`) and (`a`.`m` = `rr`.`m`) and (`a`.`n` = `rr`.`n`) and (`a`.`o` = `rr`.`o`))))
